amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the National Capital Performing Arts/Capital Concerts by $2,206,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the Operation of the National Park System by $2,206,000 by striking funding for the National Capital Performing Arts/Capital Concerts and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Amash amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 131 - 294, 1 Present (Roll no. 654).
